import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const OrderSelect = (props) => { const { order, changeSelect } = props const [orderState, setOrderState] = useState(order) useEffect(() => { console.log({ orderState }) changeSelect(orderState) // eslint-disable-next-line }, [orderState]) return ( <>

order: { order }

) } export default OrderSelect
